text: Edward Harleston (December 25, 1794 – January 26, 1826) was an American planter and politician. Harleston, son of Edward and Annabella (Moultrie) Harleston, was born in Charleston, S. C., 25th Dec, 1794, and died 11th Feb., 1871, aged 76 years. He graduated from Yale College in 1815. Most of his life was passed as a planter of rice and cotton. He served in the South Carolina State Legislature several years. He married, 26th Jan., 1826, Ann Isabella Huger, who survived him. ==External links== * Category:1794 births Category:1826 deaths Category:Yale College alumni Category:Members of the South Carolina General Assembly Category:American planters Category:Politicians from Charleston, South Carolina Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Edward Harleston
